org.intermine.bio.dataconversion

Class HomophilaConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.dataconversion.DataConverter
      • org.intermine.dataconversion.FileConverter
        • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.BioFileConverter
          • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.HomophilaConverter

  • public class HomophilaConverter
extends BioFileConverter
    DataConverter to parse homophila data file into Items.

                  Model model)

    • Method Detail

      • readDiseaseDescriptions

        protected void readDiseaseDescriptions(java.io.Reader reader)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Read omim ids and descriptions from reader. Input is two columns, tab seperated, first column is OMIM id and second column is a line of description. There may be several lines of description (with the same OMIM id) on adjacent lines.
        Parameters:
        reader - reader
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be found/read

      • readProteinGeneFile

        protected void readProteinGeneFile(java.io.Reader reader)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Read mappings from protein id to gene id.
        Parameters:
        reader - reader
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be found/read

      • setDiseasefile

        public void setDiseasefile(java.io.File diseaseFile)
        Set the disease description input file. This file just contains OMIM ids and several lines of description for each id.
        Parameters:
        diseaseFile - disease description input file

      • setProteingenefile

        public void setProteingenefile(java.io.File proteinGeneFile)
        Set the protein to gene input file. This file contains two columns, the NP_ protein id followed by the gene id.
        Parameters:
        proteinGeneFile - protein to gene input file
